an7.37:1.1: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu mitto sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo api panujjamanenapi.
an7.37:1.3: Piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca vatta ca vacanakkhamo ca gambhiranca katham katta hoti, no ca atthane niyojeti.
an7.37:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu mitto sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupasitabbo api panujjamanenapiti.
